duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage all aspects of the company's safety culture to ensure an injury-free environment.
Provide management of subcontractors and organization of the overall job and workflow.
Develop work plans for subcontractors and self-performed work, and manage the care, custody, and control of the project site.
Create, manage, and implement the project's schedule, and track and monitor project budget and costs.
Communicate key project information to stakeholders and participate in project review meetings.
Identify and recruit top talent, and promote a culture of diversity and inclusion within the organization.
Manage stand-alone projects from start to finish, including management, scheduling, production, safety, and quality.
Actively manage project risks and provide solutions for review and implementation by the team.
Participate in project pursuits and negotiate project changes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in construction management, engineering or related field (Preferred)
